channel.title: CVE Feed for Palo Alto Networks -- GlobalProtect Agent for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palo Alto Networks -- GlobalProtect Agent for Windows

item.title: CVE-2019-17435|2024-08-05T01:40:15.808Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- globalprotect%20agent%20for%20windows
item.description: A Local Privilege Escalation vulnerability exists in the GlobalProtect Agent for Windows 5.0.3 and earlier, and GlobalProtect Agent for Windows 4.1.12 and earlier, in which the auto-update feature can allow for modification of a GlobalProtect Agent MSI installer package on disk before installation.
